name: Lanturn
flavorText:
The light it emits
is so bright that
it can illuminate the sea's surface
from a depth of
over three miles.

previous.name: Chinchou
previous.flavorText:
Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one
another to claim their respective turf.

next.name: Pichu
next.flavorText:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.
next.formDescription: Spiky-eared Pichu can only be received by taking the shiny Pichu from an official promotion to celebi's shrine in ilex forest.  Spiky-eared Pichu is always female, cannot evolve, cannot be taken into the Wi-Fi Club or the Union Room, and cannot be transferred to Generation V, but is otherwise a normal Pichu.
